snippet: Cuba has elevated Bruno Rodríguez to the Communist Party’s Political Bureau, where he will join a handful of other senior leaders who are a generation younger than Fidel and Raúl Castro.
lead_paragraph: Cuba has elevated Bruno Rodríguez to the Communist Party’s Political Bureau, where he will join a handful of other senior leaders who are a generation younger than Fidel and Raúl Castro.

headline.main: Cuban Foreign Minister Named to Top Party Body
headline.print_headline: Cuba: Foreign Minister Named to Top Party Body
